author: NiceG2000
post_text: May 12, 2015 at 9:20 PM#1I have been pondering for awhile a way to make an effective macro to turn everything else off except for the page I am on. Right now I have a 40+ line macro that turns everything off by name. I have been told you can use SetVar to make the line shorter. How would your write," set the variable to "johnny be good" if not "johnny be good" turn off" ? When I add new pages I don't want to have to write  40+ line macro. Thanks.
title: setvar question
